CREATE FUNCTION dbo.GetOrdersForCustomer (@customerId INT)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
    SELECT OrderID, OrderDate
    FROM Orders
    WHERE CustomerID = @customerId
);

CREATE FUNCTION dbo.SplitString (@inputString NVARCHAR(MAX))
RETURNS @outputTable TABLE (Value NVARCHAR(MAX))
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @pos INT, @nextPos INT, @len INT
    SET @pos = 1
    SET @nextPos = 1
    SET @len = LEN(@inputString)

    WHILE @pos <= @len
    BEGIN
        SET @nextPos = CHARINDEX(',', @inputString, @pos)
        IF @nextPos = 0
            SET @nextPos = @len + 1
        INSERT INTO @outputTable (Value) VALUES (SUBSTRING(@inputString, @pos, @nextPos - @pos))
        SET @pos = @nextPos + 1
    END

    RETURN;
END;
